title: Saag aloo
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons groundnut oil', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '1 teaspoon mustard seeds', '2 dried red chillies, halved', '6 fresh curry leaves', '1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 pinch asafoetida powder', '315g cubed potatoes', 'salt to taste', '2 tablespoons water', '1 tablespoon groundnut oil', '180g fresh spinach, chopped', 'salt to taste', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin']
